members.name: variant
members.description: The badge's variant.

members.name: ping
members.description: Makes the badge pulsate to draw attention.

attributes.name: variant
attributes.description: The badge's variant.

attributes.name: ping
attributes.description: Makes the badge pulsate to draw attention.

members.name: variantClass
formSubmitController
disabled
members.description: Disables the button.

members.name: type
members.description:
The type of button. When the type is `submit`, the button will
submit the surrounding form. Note that the default
value is `button` instead of `submit`, which is opposite of how native
`<button>` elements behave.

members.name: name
members.description: An optional name for the button. Ignored when `href` is set.

members.name: value
members.description: An optional value for the button. Ignored when `href` is set.

members.name: href
members.description:
When set, the underlying button will be rendered as an `<a>`
with this `href` instead of a `<button>`.

members.name: target
members.description: Tells the browser where to open the link. Only used when `href` is set.

members.name: download
members.description:
Tells the browser to download the linked file
as this filename. Only used when `href` is set.

members.name: form
members.description:
The "form owner" to associate the button with. If omitted,
the closest containing form will be used instead. The
value of this attribute must be an id of a form in
the same document or shadow root as the button.

members.name: formAction
members.description: Used to override the form owner's `action` attribute.

members.name: formMethod
members.description: Used to override the form owner's `method` attribute.

members.name: formNoValidate
members.description: Used to override the form owner's `novalidate` attribute.

members.name: formTarget
members.description: Used to override the form owner's `target` attribute.

members.name: click
members.description: Simulates a click on the button.

members.name: focus
members.description: Sets focus on the button.

members.name: blur
members.description: Removes focus from the button.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disables the button.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description:

submit the surrounding form. Note that the default
value is `button` instead of `submit`, which is opposite of how native
`<button>` elements behave.

attributes.description: Used to override the form owner's `action` attribute.

members.name: summary
members.description:
The summary to show in the details header.
If you need to display HTML, use the `summary` slot instead.

members.name: open
members.description:
Indicates whether or not the details is open.
You can use this in lieu of the show/hide methods.

members.name: disabled
members.description: Disables the details so it can't be toggled.

members.name: inherit
members.description: Makes the header non-tapable – should be used, if you have a button inside the element

members.name: show
members.description: Shows the details.

members.name: hide
members.description: Hides the details

attributes.name: summary
attributes.description:
The summary to show in the details header.
If you need to display HTML, use the `summary` slot instead.

attributes.name: open
attributes.description:
Indicates whether or not the details is open.
You can use this in lieu of the show/hide methods.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disables the details so it can't be toggled.

events.description: Emitted after the details opens and all animations are complete.
events.name: sl-after-show

events.description: Emitted after the details closes and all animations are complete.

slots.description: The chip's content. Inspired by: - https://m3.material.io/components/chips/overview - https://material.io/components/chips - https://tailwindui.com/components/application-ui/elements/badges

members.name: as
members.description: Overwrites default of TailitChip

members.name: filled
members.description: Changes the buttons style. This is especially useful for filter-styles.
